pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pidgin is an instant messaging program for Windows, Linux, BSD, and other Unixes. You can talk to your friends using AIM, ICQ, Jabber/XMPP, MSN Messenger, Yahoo!, Bonjour, Gadu-Gadu, IRC, Novell GroupWise Messenger, QQ, Lotus Sametime, SIMPLE, and Zephyr.

use.flag: Enable meanwhile support for Sametime protocol
Build libgnt (GLib Ncurses Toolkit used by finch) with python scripting support
Use X screensaver protocol extension to monitor idle/active status based on mouse/keyboard events
